info.sourceTextContent: Vete a este pueblo, examinalo todo; me daras cuenta, y por tu informe determinare si he de castigar o exterminar la ciudad. Yo, senor, respondio humildemente Babuco, ni he estado nunca en Persia, ni conozco en todo aquel imperio a ninguno.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Go to this people, examine them all; I will notice, and your report may determine whether I have to punish or destroy the city. I Sir, Babuca humbly replied, nor have I ever been in Persia, nor do I know all that Empire to none
